    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeystoreKeyProvider(java.security.KeyStore keyStore, char[] keyStorePass, java.lang.String masterKeyAlias)
      Loads all key pairs from the specified key store and identifies the master key by the specified alias.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeystoreKeyProvider

        public KeystoreKeyProvider(java.security.KeyStore keyStore,
                           char[] keyStorePass,
                           java.lang.String masterKeyAlias)
                    throws java.security.KeyStoreException,
                           java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                           java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                           java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException
        Loads all key pairs from the specified key store and identifies the master key by the specified alias.

        This assumes that all keys share the same password.

        Throws:
        java.security.KeyStoreException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException
